text: The film's story is very fast-paced, the director should have gone into more depth to have enough time to show his heart a little, but unfortunately it didn't work out.

What an absolutely beautiful movie - and the premise being based on a real life story made it even more heartwarming. It also had great moments of levity that laced together to really pull at the heartstrings when Sol's diagnosis comes out. I found the movie both wholesome and inspirational even though it has some truly somber aspects. I highly recommend this movie to people looking for a beautiful love story that is set against incredibly tragic odds and yet seeks to prove that all that really matters in this life are the people who love you, and the memories you create together.

Baseado em fatos reais, por aí já sabemos que "senta que lá vem história e muitas lágrimas" e aqui é bem isso, as lágrimas eu guardei para o final, mas o aperto no peito a todo momento, ficamos a pensar nas pessoas que amamos, e isso dói... Um filme simples e lindinho, uma linda homenagem, um amor-perfeito, romance interrompido pelo trágico...
